name: Smash It! (Dipzza)
description:
Old game I made in high school inspired by Super Mario War. There is no feedback for it, but if you jump against walls it gives you a height boost!

There are no builds for Linux or web because it is literally illegal for me to distribute builds for other platforms :(. This is due to the game being made with GameMaker 1, which makes even opening the project a huge challenge now.
